translated: He took her and went to Mahāprajāpatī Gautamī.

original: rkang pa la phyag byas te /
analyzed: rkang pa la phyag byas te /
translated: He bowed at her feet🔽and said,🔽“Noble one, this is my wife.

original: 'phags ma rang gi las kyis 'di legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lags kyi /🔽rab tu phyung zhig /
analyzed: 'phags ma rang gi las kyis 'di legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lags kyi / rab tu phyung zhig /
translated: Please allow my going forth.

original: bdag kyang dze ta'i tshal du mchis la rab tu byung ngo //🔽zhes smras nas /
analyzed: bdag kyang dze ta'i tshal du mchis la rab tu byung ngo // zhes smras nas /
translated: I too will go to Jetavana and go forth.🔽Having said this,

original: des smras pa /
analyzed: des smras pa /
translated: she said,

original: bu khyod chung ma dang bcas te sems bskyed pa ni legs te /
analyzed: bu khyod chung ma dang bcas te sems bskyed pa ni legs te /
translated: Son, it is good that you and your wife have generated the mind of awakening.

original: rab tu byung ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
translated: As for going forth, the Blessed One has said,

original: yon tan lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so //
analyzed: yon tan lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so //
translated: The wise one who sees five qualities should aspire to going forth.

original: zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas /
translated: and so on.🔽🔽

original: snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dang / mkhas pa dang / yang dag par song ba dang / skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rnam grangs du mas kyang rab tu byung ba ni bstod kyi /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dang / mkhas pa dang / yang dag par song ba dang / skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rnam grangs du mas kyang rab tu byung ba ni bstod kyi /
translated: up to As the Buddha, the Buddha's disciples, the wise, the righteous, and the holy ones have praised going forth in many ways,

original: legs te rab tu dbyung gi /
analyzed: legs te rab tu dbyung gi /
translated: it is good. I will allow your going forth.

original: song zhig ces smras nas de rab tu phyung ngo //
analyzed: song zhig ces smras nas de rab tu phyung ngo //
translated: Go forth. Having said this, she allowed his going forth.

original: de yang dze ta'i tshal du song nas /
analyzed: de yang dze ta'i tshal du song nas /
translated: He went to Jetavana,

original: dge slong dag las rab tu byung ste /🔽de mnyan du yod pa'i tshong dpon zhig rab tu byung ngo //
analyzed: dge slong dag las rab tu byung ste / de mnyan du yod pa'i tshong dpon zhig rab tu byung ngo //
translated: and after going forth among the monks,

original: zhes grags par gyur te /
analyzed: zhes grags par gyur te /
translated: he became known as the merchant-banker of Śrāvastī.🔽He obtained great merit,

original: bsod nams chen po thob pa ni chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman spyad dang / yo byad rnams so //
analyzed: bsod nams chen po thob pa ni chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman spyad dang / yo byad rnams so //
translated: and he used the requisites of Dharma robes, alms-food, bedding, and medicine for curing the sick.

original: de dus phyi zhig na bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so //
analyzed: de dus phyi zhig na bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so //
translated: Later, he went out for alms.

original: de'i chung ma de yang bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de'i dus na mu ge @211b chen pos de bsod snyoms kyis phongs so //
analyzed: de'i chung ma de yang bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de'i dus na mu ge @211b chen pos de bsod snyoms kyis phongs so //
translated: His wife also went out for alms, and at that time, because of a great famine, she was unable to get any alms.

original: des de mthong nas smras pa /
analyzed: des de mthong nas smras pa /
translated: When he saw her, he said,

original: sring mo ji ltar 'tsho zhing 'dug /
analyzed: sring mo ji ltar 'tsho zhing 'dug /
translated: “Sister, how are you getting by?”

original: des 'phags pa mu ge'i dus la bab pas bsod snyoms kyi zas su yang mi ster te /
analyzed: des 'phags pa mu ge'i dus la bab pas bsod snyoms kyi zas su yang mi ster te /
translated: She said, “Noble one, because of the famine, I am not given any alms-food.

original: sdug bsngal zhing 'tsho mod /
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhing 'tsho mod /
translated: I am suffering, but I am getting by.”

original: ces smras pa dang / des sring mo nga la bsod snyoms 'byor pa yod mod kyi /
analyzed: ces smras pa dang / des sring mo nga la bsod snyoms 'byor pa yod mod kyi /
translated: He said, “Sister, I do have some alms-food.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bsod snyoms kyis phyed sbyin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bsod snyoms kyis phyed sbyin no //
translated: If the Blessed One allows it, I will give her half of my alms.”

original: zhes smras pa dang / de cang mi zer bar dbyar mo khang du song nas /
analyzed: zhes smras pa dang / de cang mi zer bar dbyar mo khang du song nas /
translated: She went to the rainy season hut without saying anything more.

original: ji ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag la smras pa dang / de dag gis dge slong dag la smras pa /
analyzed: ji ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag la smras pa dang / de dag gis dge slong dag la smras pa /
translated: She told the nuns what had happened, and they told the monks.

original: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i dge slong ma la gang dge slong gis bsod snyoms shig 'byor na /
analyzed: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i dge slong ma la gang dge slong gis bsod snyoms shig 'byor na /
translated: The monks asked the Blessed One about it, and the Blessed One said, “If a monk obtains alms, he should give half of them to a nun like this.

original: dge slong des mu ge'i dus na /
analyzed: dge slong des mu ge'i dus na /
translated: If a monk obtains alms during a famine,

original: de la bsod snyoms kyi phyed sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: de la bsod snyoms kyi phyed sbyin par bya ste /
translated: he should give half of them to her.

original: de de la the tshom ma byed cig /🔽ces bka' stsal to //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i dge slong ma la gang dge slong gis bsod snyoms shig 'byor na dge slong des mu ge'i dus la bab pa dang / de la bsod snyoms kyi phyed byin cig /
analyzed: de de la the tshom ma byed cig / ces bka' stsal to // bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i dge slong ma la gang dge slong gis bsod snyoms shig 'byor na dge slong des mu ge'i dus la bab pa dang / de la bsod snyoms kyi phyed byin cig /
translated: Do not hesitate to do so.”🔽The Blessed One said, “If a monk obtains alms, he should give half of them to a nun like this.

original: ces bka' stsal nas /
analyzed: ces bka' stsal nas /
translated: If a monk obtains alms during a famine, he should give half of them to her.”

original: des de la bsod snyoms kyi phyed bzhag pa dang / des de za zhing song ngo //
analyzed: des de la bsod snyoms kyi phyed bzhag pa dang / des de za zhing song ngo //
translated: He gave her half of his alms-food, and she ate it and left.

original: de la dus phyi zhig na 'phral la byin pa'i bsod snyoms zhig rnyed de /
analyzed: de la dus phyi zhig na 'phral la byin pa'i bsod snyoms zhig rnyed de /
translated: Later, she found some alms-food that had been given to her spontaneously.

original: dge slong de'i drung du ma song ba dang / dge slong des bsams pa /
analyzed: dge slong de'i drung du ma song ba dang / dge slong des bsams pa /
translated: She did not go to the monk, and the monk thought,

original: de ni gud nas zas rnyed du nges te /
analyzed: de ni gud nas zas rnyed du nges te /
translated: “She must have found food elsewhere.

original: de'i phyir 'dir ma 'ongs na /🔽'di su'i phyir bzhag /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir ma 'ongs na / 'di su'i phyir bzhag /
translated: Since she did not come here,

original: snyam du bsams @212a *//
analyzed: snyam du bsams @212a *//
translated: why did I set aside some food for her?”

original: nas; des de ma bzhag pa dang / ji tsam zhig na dge slong ma de yang 'ongs te /
analyzed: nas; des de ma bzhag pa dang / ji tsam zhig na dge slong ma de yang 'ongs te /
translated: He did not set aside any food, and when the nun came,

original: des sring mo khyod mi 'ongs snyam nas /
analyzed: des sring mo khyod mi 'ongs snyam nas /
translated: he said, “Sister, I thought you were not coming,

original: bdag gi bsod snyoms ma bzhag ste /
analyzed: bdag gi bsod snyoms ma bzhag ste /
translated: so I did not set aside any of my alms-food for you.🔽I have set aside this food, so if the Blessed One permits it, I will give it to you.”

original: zas 'di ni bzhag pa zhig na de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni 'di bdag gis sbyin no zhes smras pa dang / des de'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas /
analyzed: zas 'di ni bzhag pa zhig na de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni 'di bdag gis sbyin no zhes smras pa dang / des de'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas /
translated: She bowed down at his feet,

original: dbyar mo khang du song ste /
analyzed: dbyar mo khang du song ste /
translated: went to the rainy-season retreat house,

original: des ji ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag la smras nas /
analyzed: des ji ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag la smras nas /
translated: and told the nuns what had happened.

original: de dag gis dge slong dag la smras te /
analyzed: de dag gis dge slong dag la smras te /
translated: They told the monks,🔽and the monks told the Blessed One.

original: dge slong dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽de lta bas na /
analyzed: dge slong dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / de lta bas na /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag gis bzhag pa dge slong mas byin len byos la bza' bar gnang ngo //
analyzed: dge slong dag gis bzhag pa dge slong mas byin len byos la bza' bar gnang ngo //
translated: “Monks, I allow you to eat the food that the nuns have set out after the monks have received it.

original: gang yang dge slong mas bzhag pa de ni dge slong gis byin len byos shig /
analyzed: gang yang dge slong mas bzhag pa de ni dge slong gis byin len byos shig /
translated: And whatever the nuns have set out, the monks should receive it.

original: 'di la the tshom ma byed par dge slong mas ni dge slong la byin len bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la the tshom ma byed par dge slong mas ni dge slong la byin len bya'o //
translated: Do not doubt this. The nuns should receive it from the monks.

original: dge slong dag gis kyang dge slong ma la byin len bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong dag gis kyang dge slong ma la byin len bya'o //
translated: And the monks should receive it from the nuns.

original: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Story of the Nuns in Śrāvastī

original: dge slong dag gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi dbus su thun mong ma yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos dris pa dang / de ngo tsha nas gdong smad de 'dug go //
analyzed: dge slong dag gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi dbus su thun mong ma yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos dris pa dang / de ngo tsha nas gdong smad de 'dug go //
translated: When the monks asked the nuns about the uncommon obstacles in the midst of the community of nuns, she was ashamed and sat with her head down.

original: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas /
translated: When the monks told the Blessed One what had happened,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag gis dge slong ma la thun mong ma yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos dri bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong dag gis dge slong ma la thun mong ma yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos dri bar mi bya'o //
translated: “Monks should not ask nuns about the individual conditions that are obstacles.

original: dge slong ma nyid kyis dris shig /
analyzed: dge slong ma nyid kyis dris shig /
translated: The nuns themselves should ask.

original: @212b dge slong gis dge slong ma la dge slong ma de'i thun mong ma yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos 'dri na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @212b dge slong gis dge slong ma la dge slong ma de'i thun mong ma yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos 'dri na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
translated: If a monk asks a nun about the individual conditions that are obstacles for that nun, he commits an offense entailing confession.

original: dge slong dag gis thun mong gi bar chad kyi chos dri bar brtsams na /
analyzed: dge slong dag gis thun mong gi bar chad kyi chos dri bar brtsams na /
translated: “Monks began to ask nuns about the general conditions that are obstacles.

original: 'on kyang ngo tsha nas ma smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: 'on kyang ngo tsha nas ma smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: However, they did not speak because they were embarrassed. The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong ma drung du zhog la dris shig /🔽des ni dge slong mal smros shig /
analyzed: dge slong ma drung du zhog la dris shig / des ni dge slong mal smros shig /
translated: “Place the nun in front of you and ask her.🔽She will speak to the monk.

original: dge slong ma des kyang dge slong la smros shig /
analyzed: dge slong ma des kyang dge slong la smros shig /
translated: The nun should also speak to the monk.”

original: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: The Setting was in Śrāvastī.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la dge slong ma zhig bsnyen par rdzogs te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la dge slong ma zhig bsnyen par rdzogs te /
translated: A nun was fully ordained by Venerable Śāriputra.

original: 'di ltar khyod shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la bsnyen par rdzogs nas /
analyzed: 'di ltar khyod shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la bsnyen par rdzogs nas /
translated: In this way, you have received full ordination in the teaching of the supreme vehicle of the perfection of wisdom.

original: ji ltar khom pa phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka' ba 'di la skyo bar ma byed cig /
analyzed: ji ltar khom pa phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka' ba 'di la skyo bar ma byed cig /
translated: Do not be discouraged by this difficult opportunity you have found.

original: ces bsgo ba de'i bar du der khrag zags nas /
analyzed: ces bsgo ba de'i bar du der khrag zags nas /
translated: Until this was said, blood flowed from her.

original: de la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus sring mo longs te song zhig /
analyzed: de la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus sring mo longs te song zhig /
translated: The Venerable Sariputra said, Sister, get up and go.

original: ces smras pa dang / de khrag zags te ngo tsha nas yid la gnong bas ma langs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus de shes nas song ngo //
analyzed: ces smras pa dang / de khrag zags te ngo tsha nas yid la gnong bas ma langs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus de shes nas song ngo //
translated: Because she was ashamed of the blood flowing from her, she did not get up out of embarrassment, and the Venerable Sariputra, understanding, left.

original: de la dge slong ma dag gis nu mo dkyil 'khor nyid du khyod kyis slob dpon la ma dad par bya'am /
analyzed: de la dge slong ma dag gis nu mo dkyil 'khor nyid du khyod kyis slob dpon la ma dad par bya'am /
translated: Sister, did you not have faith in the master in the middle of the mandala?🔽 When he said, Get up, why did you not get up?

original: longs zhes bsgon khyod ci'i phyir mi ldang zhes smras pa dang / des phu nu mo dag 'di ni yon tan chen po'o //
analyzed: longs zhes bsgon khyod ci'i phyir mi ldang zhes smras pa dang / des phu nu mo dag 'di ni yon tan chen po'o //
translated: She said, Sisters, this is a great quality.

original: bdag la 'di lta bu las med na khyed kyang 'di skad smra'am /
analyzed: bdag la 'di lta bu las med na khyed kyang 'di skad smra'am /
translated: If I had no such thing, would you say this?

original: bdag tsog bur 'dug pas khrag zags na /
analyzed: bdag tsog bur 'dug pas khrag zags na /
translated: “I am sitting cross-legged. If blood comes out,🔽how can I stand up?”

original: ji ltar ldang zhes smras pa dang / de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug go /🔽de ltar gyur pa de dag @213a *//
analyzed: ji ltar ldang zhes smras pa dang / de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug go / de ltar gyur pa de dag @213a *//
translated: They sat there without saying anything.

original: gis dge slong dag la byas nas /
analyzed: gis dge slong dag la byas nas /
translated: They told the monks what had happened.

original: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks told the Blessed One, and the Blessed One said,

original: de lta bas na dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa tsog phur ma 'dug par pha gu'am /
analyzed: de lta bas na dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa tsog phur ma 'dug par pha gu'am /
translated: “Therefore, monks, when you are giving full ordination to a nun, do not have her sit cross-legged.

original: rtsva'am / stan nang tshangs can gyi steng du gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: rtsva'am / stan nang tshangs can gyi steng du gzhag par bya ste /
translated: Have her sit on a wooden plank, grass, or a cushion with a hole in it.

original: bud med lto snyi ba'i phyir ro //🔽sngo ma ni /
analyzed: bud med lto snyi ba'i phyir ro // sngo ma ni /
translated: Because women’s bellies are soft.

original: dge slong lhag ma mi rung ste /
analyzed: dge slong lhag ma mi rung ste /
translated: It is not suitable for a nun to be a monk’s superior.

original: mi gtsang ba ni rked chings dang / nu chings dang yang nu rten gyis //
analyzed: mi gtsang ba ni rked chings dang / nu chings dang yang nu rten gyis //
translated: Because of impurity, she should not wear a belt, a breast band, or a breast support.

original: bar chad de dag bcang mi bya //
analyzed: bar chad de dag bcang mi bya //
translated: She should not carry those things that are obstacles.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
translated: The Blessed Buddha was staying at Śrāvastī, in Jeta’s Grove, in Anāthapiṇḍada’s park.

original: de nas go'u ta mi skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo //
analyzed: de nas go'u ta mi skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo //
translated: Then Gautami, the chief of the group of five hundred,

original: 'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las /
analyzed: 'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las /
translated: went on a journey through the country.

original: nyi ma nub kar dze ta'i tshal du phyin nas des mnyan du yod par 'dong du ni dus las yol na 'di nyid du 'di ji lta bu de lta bur nub mo gnas te /
analyzed: nyi ma nub kar dze ta'i tshal du phyin nas des mnyan du yod par 'dong du ni dus las yol na 'di nyid du 'di ji lta bu de lta bur nub mo gnas te /
translated: When the sun was setting, she arrived at Jetavana. She thought, “It is too late to go to Śrāvastī. I will stay here for the night.”

original: nang bar nam nangs nas dong ngo snyam bsams te /
analyzed: nang bar nam nangs nas dong ngo snyam bsams te /
translated: She thought, “In the morning, I will go.”

original: de sa la nyal bas de'i chos gos rnams rdul gyis gos par gyur to //
analyzed: de sa la nyal bas de'i chos gos rnams rdul gyis gos par gyur to //
translated: She lay down on the ground, and her Dharma robes became covered with dust.

original: de nang bar nam nangs nas phyir yang 'ong dgos kyi cig car ston pa la phyag byas te 'dong ngo snyam bsams nas /🔽de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
analyzed: de nang bar nam nangs nas phyir yang 'ong dgos kyi cig car ston pa la phyag byas te 'dong ngo snyam bsams nas / de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
translated: She thought, “I will have to come back in the morning. I will pay homage to the Teacher and then go.”🔽They went to where the Bhagavān was.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te /
translated: When they arrived, they bowed at the Bhagavān’s feet

original: spyan sngar 'khod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i chos gos rdul gyis gos par @213b gzigs nas /
analyzed: spyan sngar 'khod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i chos gos rdul gyis gos par @213b gzigs nas /
translated: and sat in front of him. The Bhagavān saw that her Dharma robes were covered with dust.

original: go'u ta mi khyod kyi chos gos la rdul sus bsgos /
analyzed: go'u ta mi khyod kyi chos gos la rdul sus bsgos /
translated: “Gautama, who has dirtied your robe?”

original: zhes rmas pa dang / des ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu gsol te /
analyzed: zhes rmas pa dang / des ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu gsol te /
translated: He told her in detail what had happened.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the venerable Ānanda,

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: “Ānanda,

original: dge slong dag gi dge slong ma la dge slong gi mal stan gyi lhag ma ma byin nam /
analyzed: dge slong dag gi dge slong ma la dge slong gi mal stan gyi lhag ma ma byin nam /
translated: did the monks not give the nuns the remainder of the monks’ bedding?”

original: ma stsal to //
analyzed: ma stsal to //
translated: “They did not give it to them.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: kun dga' bo de lta bas na gnang ba ni dge slong gi mal stan gyi lhag ma dge slong ma la byin cig /
